caption.p: Genome completeness before and after genome finishing. (A) Genome of dolphin rhabdovirus (DRV). (B) Genome of red fox fecal rhabdovirus (RFFRV). (C) Genome of python nidovirus (PNV). Indicated is contig size after initial genome assembly (red) and after genome finishing (blue). Striped line at the 5′ end of PNV indicates putative unresolved 5′ end.
